parameters.name: PositionName
parameters.description: Name of mate position to delete

title: IMateControllerFeatureData.DeletePosition
description: Deletes the specified mate position from this mate controller.

parameters.name: PositionName
parameters.description: Name of mate position to delete

returns: True if mate position successfully deleted, false if not
remarks:
Before calling this method, use
IMateControllerFeatureData::GetPositions
to get the existing mate positions.
